title: Create personal portfolio website for Meghana Jha

requirements.text: Create a homepage with a hero section displaying 'MEGHANA JHA' as the main heading and 'STUDENT OF BIOMEDICAL SCIENCE AT UNIVERSITY OF DELHI' as the subtitle
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays the user's name prominently
Subtitle shows the student's current program and university
Hero section is visually distinct and welcoming

requirements.text: Create a Profile section displaying the bio: 'Biomedical Science Student with a strong commitment to skill development and professional growth. Seeking an opportunity to gain practical exposure in clinical laboratory settings and build foundational biomedical skills.'
acceptanceCriteria: Profile section contains the complete bio text
Text is readable and well-formatted

requirements.text: Create a Contact section displaying phone number (7879010587) and email (meghana250306@gmail.com)
acceptanceCriteria: Contact information is clearly visible
Email is clickable as a mailto link
Phone number is formatted properly

requirements.text: Create an Education section showing: Bhaskaracharya College Of Applied Sciences (2024-present) with BSc Hons. Biomedical Science, CGPA 8.09; Kendriya Vidyalaya No.2 AFS Gwalior Class XII (2023) with 88%; Class X (2021) with 98% and achievement note 'Awarded a certificate and prize money for being in the top 1.5% of students'
acceptanceCriteria: All three educational entries are displayed
Dates, institutions, and grades are accurate
Achievement note for Class X is included

requirements.text: Create a Projects & Internships section listing: Student at BCAS; Summer Intern in Microbiology and Pathology at Yashoda Superspeciality Hospital, Kaushambi; Winner of EduThon 2025 with TrackEd project; Presentations on curriculum topics; Workshop and seminar attendance; Group project participation; Classroom discussions; Subject-specific presentations; Two articles in Times of India; Regular meetings with academic advisors
acceptanceCriteria: All project and internship entries are displayed
Each entry is clearly formatted and readable
EduThon 2025 win and TrackEd project are highlighted

requirements.text: Create a Skills section displaying: Microsoft Excel, Laboratory techniques, Research methods, Presentation skills, Team collaboration, Writing proficiency, Document scanning, Social media management, Active learning, Research and analysis, Positive attitude
acceptanceCriteria: All 11 skills are listed
Skills are organized in a visually appealing layout

requirements.text: Create a Hobbies section displaying: Article Writing, Journal Writing, Novel reading, Poetry, Chess, Painting
acceptanceCriteria: All 6 hobbies are listed
Section is visually distinct from other content

requirements.text: Create a Languages section displaying: English (Fluent), Hindi (Native), Sanskrit (Learned)
acceptanceCriteria: All three languages with proficiency levels are shown
Proficiency levels are clearly indicated

requirements.text: Create a References section displaying: Prof. Uma Choudhry (Professor at BCAS) with email uma.chaudhry@bcas.du.ac.in; Dr. Kapil Rao (Professor at BCAS) with email kapil.rao@bcas.du.ac.in; Dr. Neha Singh (Assistant Professor at BCAS) with email neha.singh@bcas.du.ac.in
acceptanceCriteria: All three references are listed with names, titles, and emails
Email addresses are clickable mailto links

requirements.text: Implement backend functionality to upload, store, and retrieve photos and certificates with metadata

quotes: ask if you want anything like photos and certificate i want to add these things

acceptanceCriteria: Backend accepts file uploads for photos and certificates
Files are stored with appropriate metadata (type, name, upload date)
Backend provides endpoints to retrieve uploaded files

requirements.text: Create a media gallery section on the frontend to display uploaded photos and certificates with upload capability

quotes: ask if you want anything like photos and certificate i want to add these things

acceptanceCriteria: Users can upload photos through the interface
Users can upload certificates through the interface
Uploaded photos and certificates are displayed in a gallery format
Each item can be viewed in full size

requirements.text: Implement a cohesive visual design with an academic and professional aesthetic using clean typography, a sophisticated color palette (avoid blue and purple), and a layout that emphasizes scientific credibility and research focus
acceptanceCriteria: Design reflects academic and research-oriented professionalism
Color scheme is sophisticated and distinct
Typography is clear and professional
Layout is consistent across all sections

requirements.text: Render generated profile photo and academic certificate background images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored in the correct directory
Images are accessible and display correctly
No backend routing is used for generated images

constraints: All contact information must be displayed exactly as provided
Educational achievements and dates must be accurate
Email addresses must be clickable mailto links
nonGoals: User authentication beyond basic upload functionality
